text:
Vin65 (http://vin65.com) | Vancouver, Canada | Full Time | Onsite

We're wine eCommerce & POS company, thats been leading the space for over 5 years, we're looking to bring on a new Lead Developer to help push the bar forward, bring in some new technology.

You can apply: https://www.vin65.com/About-Us/Careers/Lead-Developer
